mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", b.name AS "broker.name", b.nickname AS "broker.nickname", a.group_id AS "wxgroup.id", g.name AS "wxgroup.name", g.gid AS "wxgroup.gid", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", dt.label AS "typeDesc", a.cron AS "cron", dc.label AS "cronDesc", a.tags AS "tags", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
